019
020import net.tnemc.core.menu.handlers.StringSelectionHandler;
021import net.tnemc.menu.core.builder.IconBuilder;
022import net.tnemc.menu.core.callbacks.page.PageOpenCallback;
023import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.DataAction;
024import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.RunnableAction;
025import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.SwitchPageAction;
026import net.tnemc.menu.core.manager.MenuManager;
027import net.tnemc.menu.core.viewer.MenuViewer;
028import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
029import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageHandler;
031
032import java.util.Collections;
033import java.util.Optional;
034import java.util.UUID;
035import java.util.function.Consumer;
036
037/**
038 * MaterialSelectionMenu
039 *
040 * @author creatorfromhell
041 * @since 1.5.0.0
042 */
043public class MaterialSelectionPageCallback {
044
045  protected final String returnMenu;
046  protected final String menuName;
047  protected final int menuPage;
048  protected final int returnPage;
049  protected final String materialDataID;
050  protected final String materialPageID;
051  protected final int menuRows;
052
053  protected final Consumer<StringSelectionHandler> selectionListener;
054
055  public MaterialSelectionPageCallback(final String materialDataID, final String returnMenu, final String menuName,
056                                       final int menuPage, final int returnPage, final String materialPageID,
057                                       final int menuRows, final Consumer<StringSelectionHandler> selectionListener) {
058
059    this.returnMenu = returnMenu;
060    this.menuName = menuName;
061    this.menuPage = menuPage;
062    this.returnPage = returnPage;
063    this.materialDataID = materialDataID;
064    this.materialPageID = materialPageID;
065
066    //we need a controller row and then at least one row for items.
067    this.menuRows = (menuRows <= 1)? 2 : menuRows;
068    this.selectionListener = selectionListener;
069  }
070
071  public void handle(final PageOpenCallback callback) {
072
073    final Optional<MenuViewer> viewer = callback.getPlayer().viewer();
074    if(viewer.isPresent()) {
075
076      final UUID id = viewer.get().uuid();
077
078      final int page = (Integer)viewer.get().dataOrDefault(materialPageID, 1);
079      final int items = (menuRows - 1) * 9;
080      final int start = ((page - 1) * items);
081
082      final int maxPages = (MenuManager.instance().getHelper().materials().size() / items) + (((MenuManager.instance().getHelper().materials().size() % items) > 0)? 1 : 0);
083
084      final int prev = (page <= 1)? maxPages : page - 1;
085      final int next = (page >= maxPages)? 1 : page + 1;
086
087      if(maxPages > 1) {
088
089        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("RED_WOOL", 1)
090                                                           .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.PreviousPageDisplay"), id))
091                                                           .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.PreviousPage"), id))))
092                                           .withActions(new DataAction(materialPageID, prev), new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
093                                           .withSlot(0)
094                                           .build());
095
096        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("GREEN_WOOL", 1)
097                                                           .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.NextPageDisplay"), id))
098                                                           .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.NextPage"), id))))
099                                           .withActions(new DataAction(materialPageID, next), new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
100                                           .withSlot(8)
101                                           .build());
102      }
103
104      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("BARRIER", 1)
105                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.EscapeDisplay"), id))
106                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.Escape"), id))))
107                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(returnMenu, returnPage))
108                                         .withSlot(4)
109                                         .build());
110
111      for(int i = start; i < start + items; i++) {
112        if(MenuManager.instance().getHelper().materials().size() <= i) {
113          break;
114        }
115
116        final String material = MenuManager.instance().getHelper().materials().get(i);
117
118        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of(material, 1)
119                                                           .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyEco.Material.Select"), id))))
120                                           .withActions(new DataAction(materialDataID, material),
121                                                        new RunnableAction((click)->{
122
123                                                          if(selectionListener != null) {
124
125                                                            selectionListener.accept(new StringSelectionHandler(click, material));
126                                                          }
127                                                        }), new SwitchPageAction(returnMenu, returnPage))
128                                           .withSlot(9 + (i - start))
129                                           .build());
130      }
131    }
132  }
133}
